name: Devour them all
description:
This is an indie fighting game based on defeating waves of enemies. This game has touches of retro fighting games and a retro music during gameply too.


What to expect:

-Infinite gameplay defeating waves of enemies

-3 keys to fight

- Destroyable objects

- Throw-able objects like knives


How to play:

-Arrow keys to move

-Space to jump

-Z to punch

-X to kick

-C to defend yourself
